components.name: Constant Velocity Joint (CV Joint)
components.function: Transmit power to drive wheels while accommodating angular motion

components.name: Differential
components.function: Distributes torque between two output shafts at different speeds

components.name: Axle Halfshaft
components.function: Transmits power from differential to wheels and provides suspension movement

components.name: Universal Joint (U-joint)
components.function: Enables connection between shafts at different angles while transmitting torque
